channel.title: San Joaquin County|California|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in San Joaquin County|California|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: CA-99 South - Exits 242 and 241
item.description: CA-99 south at Exit 242 - CA-120 East/Sonora/Yosemite Ave. Approaching Exit 241 - CA-120 West/San Francisco. Continue south on CA-99 for Fresno and Los Angeles. CA-120 joins CA-99 south briefly through Manteca.

item.title: CA-99 South - Exit 252A
item.description: CA-99 south at Exit 252A - Mariposa Road/Escalon. Continue south on CA-99 for Modesto and Los Angeles.

item.title: CA-99 South/CA-4 East - Exit 252B
item.description: CA-99 South/CA-4 East approaching Exit 252B - CA-4/Farmington Road. CA-4 leaves CA-99 southbound here.

item.title: CA-99 South/CA-4 East Approaching CA-4 East
item.description: CA-99 South/CA-4 East Approaching CA-4 East/Angels Camp. This is Exit 252B (not signed). CA-4 east leaves CA-99 at Exit 252B.
